text:
e="preserve">The British royal family is the group of close relatives (family) of the monarch, currently Elizabeth II, of the United Kingdom.
Members.
HRH The Duke of Edinburgh (Prince Philip)
HRH The Duke of Gloucester (Prince Richard)
HRH The Duchess of Gloucester (born Birgitte van Deurs)
HRH The Duke of Kent (Prince Edward)
HRH The Duchess of Kent (born Katharine Worsley)
HRH Prince Michael of Kent
HRH Princess Michael of Kent (born Marie-Christine von Reibnitz)
HRH Princess Alexandra, The Honourable Lady Ogilvy

annotations.surface_form: Princess Alexandra, The Honourable Lady Ogilvy
